verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>speaketh<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3789>Write<s%> thee all the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto thee in a <S%H5612>book<s%>.

For, lo, the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that I will bring <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and I will cause them to <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> that I <S%H5414>gave<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.
And these are the <S%H1697>words<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> concerning <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and concerning <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H2731>trembling<s%>, of <S%H6343>fear<s%>, and not of <S%H7965>peace<s%>. of fear: or, there is fear, and not peace

<S%H7592>Ask<s%> ye now, and <S%H7200>see<s%> whether a <S%H2145>man<s%> doth travail with <S%H3205>child<s%>? wherefore do I <S%H7200>see<s%> every <S%H1397>man<s%> with his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on his <S%H2504>loins<s%>, as a woman in <S%H3205>travail<s%>, and all <S%H6440>faces<s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H3420>paleness<s%>? a man: Heb. a male

<S%H1945>Alas<s%>! for that <S%H3117>day<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%>, so <S%H369>that<s%> none is like it: it is even the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H6869>trouble<s%>; but he shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%> out of it.

For it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, that I will <S%H7665>break<s%> his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from off thy <S%H6677>neck<s%>, and will <S%H5423>burst<s%> thy <S%H4147>bonds<s%>, and <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall no more <S%H5647>serve<s%> themselves of him:
But they shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H1732>David<s%> their <S%H4428>king<s%>, whom I will raise <S%H6965>up<s%> unto them.

Therefore <S%H3372>fear<s%> thou not, O my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; neither be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: for, lo, I will <S%H3467>save<s%> thee from <S%H7350>afar<s%>, and thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H7628>captivity<s%>; and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%>, and shall be in <S%H8252>rest<s%>, and be <S%H7599>quiet<s%>, and none shall make him <S%H2729>afraid<s%>.

For I am with thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to <S%H3467>save<s%> thee: though I <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of all <S%H1471>nations<s%> whither I have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> thee, yet will I not <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of thee: but I will <S%H3256>correct<s%> thee in <S%H4941>measure<s%>, and will not leave thee <S%H5352>altogether<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished<s%>.
For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Thy <S%H7667>bruise<s%> is <S%H605>incurable<s%>, and thy <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>grievous<s%>.

There is none to <S%H1777>plead<s%> thy <S%H1779>cause<s%>, that thou mayest be bound <S%H4205>up<s%>: thou hast no <S%H8585>healing<s%> <S%H7499>medicines<s%>. that: Heb. for binding up, or, pressing

All thy <S%H157>lovers<s%> have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> thee; they <S%H1875>seek<s%> thee not; for I have <S%H5221>wounded<s%> thee with the <S%H4347>wound<s%> of an <S%H341>enemy<s%>, with the <S%H4148>chastisement<s%> of a cruel <S%H394>one<s%>, for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; because thy <S%H2403>sins<s%> were <S%H6105>increased<s%>.

Why <S%H2199>criest<s%> thou for thine <S%H7667>affliction<s%>? thy <S%H4341>sorrow<s%> is <S%H605>incurable<s%> for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>: because thy <S%H2403>sins<s%> were <S%H6105>increased<s%>, I have <S%H6213>done<s%> these things unto thee.

Therefore all they that <S%H398>devour<s%> thee shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%>; and all thine <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>, every one of them, shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>; and they that <S%H7601>spoil<s%> <S%H8154><s%> thee shall be a <S%H4933>spoil<s%>, and all that <S%H962>prey<s%> upon thee will I <S%H5414>give<s%> for a <S%H957>prey<s%>.

For I will <S%H5927>restore<s%> <S%H724>health<s%> unto thee, and I will <S%H7495>heal<s%> thee of thy <S%H4347>wounds<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; because they <S%H7121>called<s%> thee an <S%H5080>Outcast<s%>, saying, This is <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, whom no man seeketh <S%H1875>after<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Behold, I will bring <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H168>tents<s%>, and have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on his <S%H4908>dwellingplaces<s%>; and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H1129>builded<s%> upon her own <S%H8510>heap<s%>, and the <S%H759>palace<s%> shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> after the <S%H4941>manner<s%> thereof. heap: or, little hill

And out of them shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that make <S%H7832>merry<s%>: and I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> them, and they shall not be <S%H4591>few<s%>; I will also <S%H3513>glorify<s%> them, and they shall not be <S%H6819>small<s%>.

Their <S%H1121>children<s%> also shall be as <S%H6924>aforetime<s%>, and their <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> all that <S%H3905>oppress<s%> them.

And their <S%H117>nobles<s%> shall be of themselves, and their <S%H4910>governor<s%> shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> from the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of them; and I will cause him to draw <S%H7126>near<s%>, and he shall <S%H5066>approach<s%> unto me: for who is this that <S%H6148>engaged<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H5066>approach<s%> unto me? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And ye shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will be your <S%H430>God<s%>.

Behold, the <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> with <S%H2534>fury<s%>, a <S%H1641>continuing<s%> <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%>: it shall fall with <S%H2342>pain<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>. continuing: Heb. cutting fall: or, remain

The <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall not <S%H7725>return<s%>, until he have <S%H6213>done<s%> it, and until he have <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H4209>intents<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%>: in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> ye shall <S%H995>consider<s%> it.
